name: Truthfulness
power: Truth is the foundation of all righteous manifestations.
refinement: Speaking only what is verified and living without deception.

name: Justice
power: Applying the law of cause and effect with total fairness.
refinement: Correcting errors in the Cipher through righteous action, not emotion.

name: Equality
power: The state of being equal in all aspects of existence.
refinement: Teaching all who are worthy without withhold, maintaining 6 in all ciphers.

name: Love
power: The highest expression of understanding and peace.
refinement: Manifesting the 10th Jewel through selfless service to the nation.

name: Mercy
power: Withholding destruction when growth is still possible.
refinement: Giving the 85% a chance to see the Light if they show sincerity.

name: Patience
power: The ability to endure with a clear mental picture.
refinement: Understanding that growth (Born/9) takes a complete cycle of 360 degrees.

name: Humility
power: Recognizing that the individual is but a part of the All (Allah).

name: Knowledge
power: The gather of facts and principles of self.
refinement: Constantly learning to refine the mind from trick knowledge.

name: Wisdom
power: Wise words and deeds that manifest the truth.
refinement: Walking the talk; ensuring actions align with the Mathematics.

name: Understanding
power: The mental picture of knowledge and wisdom combined.
refinement: Seeing clearly with the third eye, beyond the surface of things.

name: Consistency
power: The power of keeping the cipher whole and unbroken.
refinement: Building (8) daily without destroying progress through negligence.

name: Self-Respect
power: Honoring the God within as the highest authority.
refinement: Refining the body and mind (Power/5) to be a fit temple.

name: Moral Courage
power: The strength to hold the truth against all opposition.
refinement: Standing on the Mathematics even when the 85% mock the culture.

name: Unselfishness
power: Putting the elevation of the nation above personal desire.
refinement: Sharing the Bread of Life (Knowledge) freely with those who seek it.
